DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to correlate the alimentary consistencies and deglutition disorders in children with cerebral palsy.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Instrumental Evaluation of Swallowing in Children With Cerebral Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: Cross-sectional and quantitative study with sample consisted of 50 children with cerebral palsy. The data collection consisted in detection of the main dysphagic manifestations in different consistency of food and types of cerebral palsy.
DOC.criteria: Children with Cerebral Palsy diagnoses were involved, independent from the pre, peri and postnatal factors and from the type of Cerebral Palsy Children who presented oropharyngelarynx structural abnormality and/or impossibility to feed by oral way
